component.name: adGroupAdsMutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes ads. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: adGroupsMutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes ad groups. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: adsMutate
component.description: Updates ads. Operation statuses are returned. Updating ads is not supported for TextAd, ExpandedDynamicSearchAd, GmailAd and ImageAd.

component.name: campaignBudgets
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaign budgets. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: campaignsMutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes campaigns. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: createCustomerClient
component.description: Creates a new client under manager. The new client customer is returned.

component.name: search
component.description: Returns all rows that match the search query.

component.name: customersMutate
component.description: Updates a customer. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: audiencesMutate
component.description: Creates audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: customAudiencesMutate
component.description: Creates or updates custom audiences. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: campaignCriteriaMutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes criteria. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: userListsMutate
component.description: Creates or updates user lists. Operation statuses are returned.
